actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act, as amended, to strengthen the remedial provisions of the act against repeated on flagrant transgressors.

summary.text: Directs the National Labor Relations Board, under the National Labor Relations Act, to identify to the Comptroller General persons who have been found to have engaged in willful, flagrant or repeated unfair labor practices. Directs the Comptroller General to distribute the names of such persons to all agencies of the United States. Forbids, with a limited exception, the awarding of government contracts to such persons for a three- year period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act, as amended, to strengthen the remedial provisions of the act against repeated on flagrant transgressors.
